title: PVP.NET PATCH KERNEL Error
body: Don't really know what happened since  everything was working fine, now out of nowhere the game won't even Launch and if i manage to actually open it looks weird and won't update or let me hit Play so i can enter. Have try a lot of stuff since yesterday and even uninstalling and reinstalling multiples times plus using their hex-tech repair tool to no avail. Please Riot any help will be appreciated.

replies.body:
Patcher Kernel Errors are usually evidence of certain administrative privileges not being assigned to League that it heavily relies on. I'd recommend [configuring your system permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) for League as your next step to see if this resolves the issue.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.

I had already try those and have some effects like the game takes quite a few minutes to open, then many times it get's stuck on 0% checking for some update ( it's suppose to be in 6.22 ) and then my only option is to either leave it and it will probably let me enter after a while or i hit the repair button and then it try but then i get stuck downloading almost the entire game again. Heck i actually manage to enter like 3 times yesterday but didn't even wanna play a game out of fear it would crash and me unable to enter right away. My only guess is something with the patch 6.22 since on other groups on Facebook a few people seems to have the same issue and the only few that have kinda fix it all they do is switch to the alpha client.

Since you're still having issues and the common solutions didn't resolve this, I'd recommend we escalate this to our tech team. If you run a set of system logs using our [HRT App](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), then attach them to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), we can continue troubleshooting this.

Let me know if you have any questions.
